snippet: Three dancers associated with the American Ballet Theater’s training program are following in their mothers’ footsteps, this season with performances in “The Nutcracker.”
abstract: Three young dancers in American Ballet Theater Studio Company's training program, who are all daughters of former ballerinas, are following in their mother's footsteps as they perform in several versions of The Nutcracker ballet this holiday season.
lead_paragraph: Three dancers associated with the American Ballet Theater’s training program are following in their mothers’ footsteps, this season with performances in “The Nutcracker.”

headline.main: Following Mom’s Footsteps, and Her Toe Work
headline.print_headline: Following Mom’s Footsteps, And Her Toe Work
